session_summary: Implemented job scheduler (F053-F061) to replace Vercel cron with local node-cron scheduler: Added ScheduledJob model to Prisma schema, installed cron package, created scheduler service with frequency calculator, added instrumentation.ts for server startup, updated next.config.ts with instrumentation hook, modified settings API to rebuild jobs when frequency changes, created scheduler API routes, tested functionality, cleaned up Vercel cron dependencies. All 61 features implemented.
